Grab 0.2 Documentation¶

What is Grab¶

Grab is the tool which simplifies writing sitescrapers.

Basic grab functions:
  • Construction and submittion HTTP request
  • Processing HTTP response
  • Parsing and filling HTML forms
  • Working with HTML DOM tree via XPath API

See Grab Tutorial for understanding main concepts of the Grab

Similar projects¶

  • Mechanize: http://wwwsearch.sourceforge.net/mechanize/
  • Scrapy: http://scrapy.org/
